member.name: M:Seq.Client.Log4Net.LoggingEventFormatter.GetValueAsLiteral(System.Object)
member.summary: GetValueAsLiteral attempts to transform the (string) object into a literal type prior to json serialization.
member.returns: A translated representation of the literal object type instead of a string.

member.name: T:Seq.Client.Log4Net.SeqAppender
member.summary: A log4net that writes events synchronously over HTTP to the Seq event server.

member.name: P:Seq.Client.Log4Net.SeqAppender.ServerUrl
member.summary: The address of the Seq server to write to. Specified in configuration like <serverUrl value="http://my-seq:5341" />.

member.name: P:Seq.Client.Log4Net.SeqAppender.ApiKey
member.summary: A Seq API key that authenticates the client to the Seq server. Specified in configuration like <apiKey value="A1A2A3A4A5A6A7A8A9A0" />.

member.name: M:Seq.Client.Log4Net.SeqAppender.AddParameter(log4net.Appender.AdoNetAppenderParameter)
member.summary: Adds a parameter to the command.
member.param: The parameter to add to the command.

remarks.para: Adds a parameter to the ordered list of command parameters.
